verses.text: Help, \sc Lord\sc*; for the godly \add man\add* ceaseth; For the faithful fail from among the children of men.
They speak vanity every one with his neighbour: \add With\add* flattering lips \add and\add* with a double heart do they speak.
The \sc Lord\sc* shall cut off all flattering lips, \add And\add* the tongue that speaketh proud \add things:\add*
Who have said, With our tongue will we prevail; Our lips \add are\add* our own: who \add is\add* lord over us?
For the oppression of the poor, for the sighing of the needy, Now will I arise, saith the \sc Lord\sc*; I will set \add him\add* in safety \add from him that\add* puffeth at him.
The words of the \sc Lord\sc* \add are\add* pure words: \add As\add* silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.
Thou shalt keep them, O \sc Lord\sc*, Thou shalt preserve them from this generation for ever.
The wicked walk on every side, When the vilest men are exalted.
